sections.text: care, defined.Medical care means amounts paid for:(1)(a) The diagnosis, care, mitigation, treatment, or prevention of disease or (b) the purpose of affecting any structure or function of the body;(2) Transportation primarily for and essential to medical care referred to in subdivision (1) of this section; and(3) Insurance covering medical care referred to in subdivisions (1) and (2) of this section.SourceLaws 1997, LB 862, ยง 12.

44-6912.Medical care, defined.

Medical care means amounts paid for:

(1)(a) The diagnosis, care, mitigation, treatment, or prevention of disease or (b) the purpose of affecting any structure or function of the body;

(2) Transportation primarily for and essential to medical care referred to in subdivision (1) of this section; and

(3) Insurance covering medical care referred to in subdivisions (1) and (2) of this section.

SourceLaws 1997, LB 862, ยง 12.
